quote: I don't believe competition's real. The risk is not losing a competition; it's not getting chosen.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional view of competition in real estate.
suggested_hook: Why competition in real estate might be a myth.

quote: The biggest waste of time is to tour an apartment that doesn't have what you want.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of preparation and efficiency.
suggested_hook: Stop wasting time on unnecessary apartment tours.
